name: Team 25: Knight Runner
description:
Controls: Space to jump/Double jump, left click to throw your axe. That's about it

Adam Harfield - 897866:

Used pixilart.com to make a war axe asset, coin asset, background for the game, two extra layers for the background (unused) and then the script for the enemy AI movement, using this tutorial: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LPNSh9mwT4w&t=6s

Jordan Alexis-Ebanks - 856806:

I used the website pixelart, to create the main character and the enemy for the game.

Before hand I planned out my designs through sketches within my sketch book.

Adam Mote - 898451:

I programmed the scripts, including player movement and the menus etc, apart from the enemy movement script. I designed all the platforms using free assets from https://www.kenney.nl/assets/platformer-pack-redux. I wrote the song used, and animated the sprites using Jordans art. I came up with the original game twist (an endless runner) and to use knights as our character.

 I used the first 4 videos from this tutorial to help: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLiyfvmtjWC_XmdYfXm2i1AQ3lKrEPgc9- as well as this page: https://answers.unity.com/questions/979929/adding-a-cooldown-time-to-a-attack.ht...

The game can be downloaded and run with the unity player, or played in the browser (though the browser version can have issues that don't happen when downloaded).

Hope you enjoy it! If you get a big score, put it in a comment for the game!
